AddUserToTeamBody.title: Add User to Team Request and Response

address.title:
the address field
Validations:
- must be at least 5 character long (meaning cannot be empty)

unit.title:
the unit if the address is an apartment
Validations:
- must be at least 1 character long (meaning cannot be empty)

zipcode.title:
the address zipcode
Validations: 
- must be exactly 5 characters this is to ensure the client inputs the proper zip code

city.title:
the city
Validations:
- must be at least 3 characters long (meaning cannot be empty)

state.title:
the state/municipality
Validations
- must be at least 2 characters long

longitude.title:
longitude
Validations: None - can be empty

lattitude.title:
latittude
Validations: None - can be empty

AuditAction.description: AuditAction defines the types of actions that can be audited.

id.description: Unique identifier for the business account.

email.description: Email associated with the business account.

address.description: Physical address associated with the business account.

bio.description: Short description of the business account. Maximum of 200 characters.

headline.description: Headline for the profile of the business account.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number associated with the business account.

tags.description: Tags associated with the business account. Between 1 and 10 tags are allowed.

authnAccountId.description: Identifier for the associated authentication service account.

isActive.description: Indicates whether the business account is active.

username.description: Username for the business account. Must be at least 10 characters long.

isPrivate.description: Indicates whether the business account is private.

isEmailVerified.description: Indicates whether the email associated with the business account has been verified.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the business account was created.

verifiedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the email for the business account was verified.

companyEstablishedDate.description: Date when the company associated with the business account was established.

companyIndustryType.description: Industry type of the company associated with the business account.

companyWebsiteUrl.description: Website URL of the company associated with the business account.

companyDescription.description: Description of the company associated with the business account.

companyName.description: Name of the company associated with the business account.

settings.description: Settings specific to the business account.

accountType.description: The type of profile associated with the business account (e.g., individual, corporate).

profileImageUrl.description: Profile image associated with the user account.

auth0UserId.title: auth0 user id associated with the business account

BusinessAccount.description: BusinessAccount represents a business account within the context of solomon-ai.

communityIdsToFollow.title:
set of community IDs to follow 
Validations:
- at least 0 and at most 20 community ids supported at one time

profileImageUrl.title:
The profile image of the user
Validations:
- must be a valid URI

auth0UserId.title: The auth0 user id of the user

 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_IN_APP: app based notification
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_SLACK: slack based notification

createdAt.description:
Add more permissions as necessary for other modules or features.
Timestamps for tracking creation and modification times.

Role.description: Role defines the role of a user in the system with specific permissions.

action.title: The type of action (created, updated, deleted)

performedBy.title: Identifier of the user who performed the action

affectedFields.description: Specific fields that were changed (if applicable)
affectedFields.title: Additional fields for enhanced auditing:

previousValues.title: Values of those fields before the change

clientIp.title: IP address of the client that initiated the change

userAgent.title: User agent string of the client

context.title: Additional context about the change (e.g., reason for change)

riskTolerance.description: Risk tolerance settings defined for user settings.

likedDashboardPanels.description: Dashboard customization, e.g., specific widgets or reports.

tagName.title:
name of tag
validations: 
- cannot be empty
- must be at least 3 characters long

tagDescription.title:
description of tag
validations: 
- cannot be empty
- must be at least 10 characters long

metadata.title:
metadata associated with tag
validations:
- must provide between 1 and 10 metadata tags

Tags.title: Tags: represents metadata tags associated to an account

teamAdmin.description:
Admin of the team.
NOTE: only one admin is allowed per team and that admin must be a business account.

memberBusinessAccounts.description: Member business accounts of the team.

createdAt.description: Timestamp for when the team was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp for when the team was last updated.

account.title:
UserAccount to update
Validation:
- cannot nil hence required

service to update a given user account

email.description: Email associated with the user account.

address.description: Physical address associated with the user.

bio.description: Brief description about the user, up to 200 characters.

headline.description: Short headline for the user's profile.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number associated with the account.

tags.description: Tags associated with the user account, between 1 and 10.

authnAccountId.description: ID for the authentication service linked to this account.

isActive.description: Indicates if the account is currently active.

username.description: Username associated with the account, minimum of 10 characters.

isPrivate.description: Indicates if the account is set to private.

isEmailVerified.description: Indicates if the user's email has been verified.

createdAt.description: Timestamp for when the account was created.

verifiedAt.description: Timestamp for when the email was verified.

settings.description: Settings specific to the user account.

accountType.description: Enum indicating the type of profile (e.g., individual, corporate).

profileImageUrl.description: Profile image associated with the user account.
